name: Vaporwave Wonderland
description:
This is a prototype thing I made awhile ago. The idea is that you would be a player who can double jump, dash and grapple around a vaporwave style level, which gets more complex as levels go on and general game stuff.

Probably the biggest thing I have made in unity (around a month long project), and the first. I'm really just posting it here, so its online somewhere.
